column4: I don't underestand because the ATI card is actually better with graffics then my brand new intel card on my lappy which works fine with ubuntu
So, if I were to buy another video card (under $100) if i were to play it safe go with a semi-new Nvida.
Nvida seems to have a love relationship with ubuntu.
Anybody recommend a economic but efficient card for use with ubuntu and the upcomming distros?

releases*
this keyboard is horrible if i type too fast menus pop up that prevent me from typing
So, I know there are some geekz out there what it is a semi decent GPU Card to buy?

First, put the person you're talking to in the message. most IRC clients highlight the message for that user then. Second, I've got no idea then. Sorry.
Ubuntu doesn't make mythTV. It's another group that makes Myth for all platforms.
if you would like to explain how to put person you're talking to in the message i will do it (it been 8 years since I used IRC)
I mean that they make a version of ubuntu i am sorry I did not make it more clear
got both. I'm not trying to be hostle. Sorry if i came off that way.
how do you directly speak to the user your chatting to its been atleast 7 years since i used mIRC
if you just put their name in like you have it'll highlight what you said to them in most clients. that way it's easier to have a conversation going on.
so, i was doing it right you the person name then this symbol " : "
Through synaptic I installed Zend for PHP and a Ruby Framework plus ruby IDE, and the files are no where to be seen, any idea
i'm pretty much as clueless as you. I just started really using linux this last year because it was easier to log into my College's computers with it. I'm still learning things all the time.
no, everyone can see them. However, we get it in red, or blue or some other shiny color. It shows our names.
